attributes.action: Send out treasury heads to see the damage high business rates are causing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Towns and villages are being decimated by the closure of businesses due to the high business rates unless action is taken to reduce rates we will have ghost towns empty of shops. Now is the time for the treasury to go out and see the damage rates are causing to our nation of shopkeepers, act NOW before its too late !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
